about_the_game:
RHYTHM AUTO-ATTACKS:

  • Your instruments will Automatically Attack to the Beat of the Music. Press inputs to the Beat to power up your Damage!

BUILD SOLOS:

  • Kill enemies and pick up energy to build up Solo Meter! Launching a Solo will trigger beautiful animations and cascading effects to help you mow down hordes of enemies.

UPGRADES:

  • Become stronger at the end of each Round by choosing Upgrades and learning creative Synergies between your Instruments.

POSSESSION:

  • Roxie's band is trapped in an eternal loop, playing music for Death. Roxie lets their ghosts possess her body, granting her the powers to fight back and win their freedom!
